description.Tell me a little bit about yourself?: My name is Ildi, I am a fullstack developer who transitioned from IT looking for opportunities in the field!

tech.What excites you about technology?: I love that technology is constantly evolving and that there is always more to learn.

techstack.What is your preferred technology stack?: My preferred techstack is NodeJS, ExpressJS, Sequelize, and React-Redux

hobbies.What are your favorite hobbies?: I love history, playing video games, and basketball.
